HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Bulk assignment of colonists and animals to outfits, areas, drugs, food, work in one single action. Setup different policies and switch at will.| HOW TO USE 1. Create a policy either for animals or for colonists by clicking the cog icon 2. Select and activate a new created policy by clicking on the button next to the cog icon 3. Configure the policy by setting the areas, outfits, drugs, etc as you always do 4. Done.|Repeat this process for other policies and THEN change between them in one click. WIN! You can also setup a default outfit, food and drug when a new colonist joins your colony Use the Emergency toggle to set the 4 policy presets for each tab all at once!
